hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: We were at school together thepillsquality.be reviews Mulally's signature move at Ford was to abandon its old house-of-brands approach and focus exclusively on mass-market Ford cars and trucks. He called it One Ford. That strategy wouldn't work at hydra-headed Microsoft with its multiple product lines. In fact, many analysts believe is that Microsoft doesn't need focus as much as it needs dismemberment -- a division of the company and eventual divestiture -- along product lines.
